newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: Bank of Korea to digest 1.3 trillion won in Repos.
newsitem.headline: Bank of Korea to digest 1.3 trillion won in Repos.

text.p: The central Bank of Korea said on Thursday it would siphon off 1.3 trillion won from the banking system by issuing repurchase agreements (Repos) maturing on May 12.
A central bank official said the repo issue was needed as about 1.3 to 1.5 trillion remained fluid in the banking system after banks met their twice monthly deadline for required won reserves.
The bank will invite a tender to sell the repos at 11:30 am (0230 GMT).
